content:
I think I'll go with the first CTA, "Learn more about the outreach committee's projects and how you can get involved." It's a great way to encourage people to learn more about the outreach committee's work and how they can contribute. Here's my revised social media post:

"Exciting news! Our outreach committee will be at the flea market on [Date] with an interactive exhibit featuring our latest projects. Take a moment to write a prayer or message of hope on our "Prayer Wall" and be a part of something special.

Learn more about the outreach committee's projects and how you can get involved! [Link to outreach committee's website or social media page]

#outreachcommittee #fleamarket #volunteer #makeadifference #communityfirst"

Thanks for the help!
